What would be an advantage of using GNSS/FMC equipment in flight?

options.text: The in-flight position of the aircraft can be continuously displayed.
The aircraft systems require less data from the Air Data Computer.
There is NO need for a route check as it is an automatic function.
In-flight weather is more easily detected and avoided.

variant.question: What would be an advantage of using GNSS/FMC equipment in flight?

options.text: You cannot fly a great circle without GNSS/FMC.
Visual meteorological conditions will be reduced.
The FMC uses the actual in-flight wind to plan a more favorable route.

variant.question: What would be an advantage of using GNSS/FMC equipment in flight?

options.text: The FMC is able to calculate the actual in-flight cruise wind without any input from other aircraft systems.
ETAs and predicted fuel remaining will be automatically corrected in case of an incorrect entry of the wind for the cruise.
The FMC will use the actual in-flight wind in the cruise to re-plan the aircraft onto a more favourable route.
The in-flight cruise wind can be updated to increase the accuracy of ETAs and predicted fuel remaining.

What will be the effect on the FMC fuel and time predictions if the aircraft is in a non-standard configuration?

options.text: Only the next waypoint ETA and remaining fuel will be accurate.
All ETAs and remaining fuel predictions will be correct.
The FMC will NOT be able to provide ETAs or remaining fuel predictions.
There wil be NO effect as the FMC will make an automatic correction.

variant.question: What will be the effect on the FMC fuel and time predictions if the aircraft is in a non-standard configuration?

options.text: ETA will be calculated accurately but fuel prediction will no longer be accurate.
All ETAs and remaining fuel predictions will be incorrect.
Only the next waypoint ETA and remaining fuel will be correct.
There will be NO effect as the FMC will make an automatic correction.

options.text: Wind must be updated manually and the new ETA or remaining FUEL will be more accurate.

FMS can create shortcut in function of the calculated wind.
